function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Influence of natural light on virus activity","Impact":"Increased transmission of viruses due to lack of natural light","Mitigation":"Increase access to natural light in building design","Technologies":"Advanced daylighting systems, light shelves, solar tubes","People":"Building occupants, facilities managers, architects, designers","Owner":"Architects, designers, building owners"},{"Description":"Influence of wastewater and waste collection systems on virus transmission","Impact":"Increased spread of SARS-CoV-2 through contaminated wastewater and waste collection systems","Mitigation":"Implement proper sanitation and waste management practices","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment systems, waste sterilization methods","People":"Waste management personnel, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, waste management companies"},{"Description":"Impact of interior finishes on virus transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to porous and difficult-to-clean interior finishes","Mitigation":"Use easy-to-clean and non-porous interior finishes","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, non-porous materials, easy-to-clean surfaces","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Building owners, interior designers, maintenance personnel"}]}
